Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.organisation.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1.0 Organize every GameRoom. Add Players to the Room with the right Game-Mode or opens a new if needed
    Author:
    Alexander Posch

      • addPlayer

        public GameRoom addPlayer(Player player)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          UnsupportedGameMode
        Add the Player player to Room depending on the GameMode the Player choosed. If the room has two players and is full then the game starts.
        Parameters:
        player - Player
        Returns:
        the gameroom, that was selected for the player
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception
        UnsupportedGameMode
